title: I gotta be the guy to say this? (DJ Sona)
body:
If you hate that a support is getting an ultimate skin I will bet money you're one of those ADC's that takes all the credit for winning bot and blames the support for their deaths.

Or you're just a Zed main.

QQ more.

As a fan of Sona and EDM, this skin is a wet dream.
So thank you Rito :)

Funny, but yes, he has received SEVERAL changes since his release, between nerfs and buffs, if you don't believe me check up the patch notes into LoL wiki or something.

V3.7:

     Razor Shuriken
        Damage dealt to secondary targets reduced to 45/69/93/117/141 (+0.6 bonus attack damage) from 60/92/124/156/188 (+0.8 bonus attack damage). 
     Living Shadow
        Vision radius of the Shadow reduced to 700 from 1300. 
     Shadow Slash
        Cooldown increased to 4 seconds from 3. 

actually that's the only patch where zed received flat-out nerfs without getting any compensation buffs, so it's quite negligible as far as "X champion being nerfed multiple times" unlike champions like Sona for example

she has received straight up nerfs in patches 5.1, 4.20, since her rework that made a lot of her mains hate her in patch 4.13 (which also was considered to be a nerf in her power level comparatively to her previous iteration)

so it's easy to understand why people might react this way

Actually:
-Q damage reduced
-W vision reduced
**-W missile speed reduced by a third**
**-E cooldown increased by 1** (this is a huge nerf, as it removes 1 E from your ultimate early game)
**-E now reduces W cd by 2 each time it hits a champion instead of 1 from every unit
**
-Indirect nerf via Botrk changes, which made him build the tank destroying build he builds today
-R ultimate now spawns a shadow from where it was cast instead of where you land, "But now he is safer", before every smart player would just leave a W behind OR go with triple shadow overkill, now you only have the first option.
-ult cast time increased by half a second
-the ones he got last patch

bolded huge nerfs

not saying he isn't a problem, but he got nerfed a lot.

W projectile speed got nerfed by 1000 (1500 from 2500).

Anyway, enough with the Zed talking, my comment was just to express myself on people hating Sona getting the ulti  and  from OP's point of view many of those people being Zed players, and as Zed player i was stating that it isn't totally true.

I think we can stop turning this thread from DJ  Sona to ANOTHER Zed thread.

**Date: July 30th, 2014**

**Riot:** Alright, so I think we can all agree we hate Sona, even though there's really nothing wrong with her, right? Let's nerf the shit out of her!!

~~~~~ ~~~~~ ~~~~~ ~~~~~ ~~~~~ ~~~~~

**Date: February 3rd, 2015**

**Riot:** Hey there, LoL Community! Here's an ultimate skin for the champ that us here at Riot have nerfed the shit out of! Now buy the skin because it's really awesome, even though we'll still nerf Sona into oblivion!


I am **very** tempted to get this skin. At first, I'm like, "Holy crap, that's freakin' awesome! I might start playing Sona again!" Then I'm like, "Oh wait, Riot's nerfed the shit out of her and will continue to do so. So what's the point?" I wanna keep track of this skin's sales and see how many people buy it, just in hope of seeing a low number of people buy it in order to spit in Riot's face for such an asshole move.
Yes, my feelings exactly.

Yeah, like, I want the skin so badly, but why should I give any money to Riot for a champ they're just going to keep ruining? They've yet to properly nerf Zed, they're afraid to touch Lee SIn without pissing off the community (like they already haven't), but out of all the champs the feel needs the most nerfing, it's Sona. She doesn't even get any LCS play anymore (which I blame both on Riot AND the players for a number of champs other than just Sona)! I think we can see some reasons as to why NikaSaur and Ms. Pudding (and probably some others) left Riot.

So yeah, if anyone can tell me, is there some website or app of some kind I can use to track the sales of a skin and/or champ? I'm really curious.
